Package com.clover.sdk.v1.printer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPrinterService
    An interface for adding, listing, and removing Clover printers.
    IReceiptRegistrationService
    An interface for registering components that wish to add additional data to customer receipts.
    PrinterContract.CategoriesColumns  
    PrinterContract.DeviceCategoriesColumns  
    PrinterContract.DevicesColumns  
    ReceiptContract.TextColumns
    Column name for returning text-only receipt data.
    ReceiptFileContract.ReceiptFileColumns  
    ReceiptRegistrationContract.RegistrationColumns  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CashDrawer Deprecated.
    This class interacts with cash drawers that are connected via configured Clover printers.
    IPrinterService.Default
    Default implementation for IPrinterService.
    IPrinterService.Stub
    Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
    IReceiptRegistrationService.Default
    Default implementation for IReceiptRegistrationService.
    IReceiptRegistrationService.Stub
    Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
    Printer
    Instances of this class may be obtained from the PrinterConnector.
    Printer.Builder  
    PrinterConnector
    A class that encapsulates interaction with IPrinterService.
    PrinterConnector.PrinterCallback<T> Deprecated.
    PrinterContract
    Contract defining printers for use in Clover applications.
    PrinterContract.Categories  
    PrinterContract.Categories.UriBuilder
    URI builder for printer categories.
    PrinterContract.DeviceCategories  
    PrinterContract.DeviceCategories.UriBuilder
    URI builder for printer device categories.
    PrinterContract.Devices  
    PrinterContract.Devices.UriBuilder
    URI builder for printer devices.
    PrinterIntent
    Definition of actions and extras for communicating with IPrinterService.
    PrintQueue
    Class for interacting with the Clover print queue.
    ReceiptContract
    A class defining the contract to be implemented by content providers that wish to provide additional content on customer receipts.
    ReceiptContract.Image  
    ReceiptContract.Text  
    ReceiptFileContract
    Contract defining interface to insert and read and write receipt files for use in Clover applications.
    ReceiptFileContract.ReceiptFileFactory  
    ReceiptFileContract.ReceiptFiles  
    ReceiptRegistration  
    ReceiptRegistration.Builder  
    ReceiptRegistrationConnector
    A class that encapsulates interaction with IReceiptRegistrationService.
    ReceiptRegistrationConnector.ReceiptRegistrationCallback<T>
    An implementation of the ServiceConnector.Callback interface for receiving asynchronous results from ReceiptRegistrationConnector methods that provides default method implementations.
    ReceiptRegistrationContract  
    ReceiptRegistrationContract.Registration  
    ReceiptRegistrationContract.Registration.UriBuilder
    URI builder for registration.
    Type
    In older versions of the clover-android-sdk this was an enum, but has now been refactored to a class to future-proof it.
    TypeDetails
    This is a replacement for the Type class.
